keyPolicies.policyDescription: Jeff Clarke proposes a strict annual limit on the numbers of non-EU economic migrants allowed to work here, preventing illegal immigration with new rules to tighten the student visa system and a dedicated Border Police Force, and promoting integration into British society by allowing people to come here to marry only if they can speak English.

issues.immigration: Jeff Clarke discusses a strict annual limit on non-EU economic migrants, tightening the student visa system, creating a dedicated Border Police Force, and requiring English proficiency for marrying into the community as part of the Conservative immigration policy.

images.caption: Image of Jeff Clarke, Prospective Conservative MP for Wirral South.
